content: What is the name of the iconic American author known for his works "The Great Gatsby" and "Tender Is the Night", whose last name also refers to a type of dance?

I believe you're referring to F. Scott Fitzgerald. He was a renowned American author famous for his novels, including "The Great Gatsby" and "Tender Is the Night." Interestingly, "Fitzgerald" is also the name of a type of dance, which adds to the connection you mentioned.
